price: 19. Yalli sin taamoomik qellissaanam kee taybulleenim inkih siinik yaaxigeeh sin elle galte-le.
arabic: وَٱللَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ مَا تُسِرُّونَ وَمَا تُعۡلِنُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wal-lahu yaʿlamu mā tusirrūna wamā tuʿ'linūna
